title: What Will You Order?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Hmm~......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Can’t decide?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>They all just look so tasty~! They have pasta bolognese, creamy salmon and spinach pasta, pasta pescatore, cod roe pasta......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I see what you mean.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yoshiko-chan, what are you gonna order?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s Yohane. Something has already caught Yohane’s eye. This one...... Diablo Mountain Pepper Pasta!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Squeak...... That looks spicy......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kuukkuku...... What a devilish pasta...... It is worthy of Yohane’s consumption!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Look, there’s a very vivid description on the menu. It says they’ve added tons of various red peppers...... So that red color all comes from the red peppers......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What? It’s not tomato sauce!? Ah, wait...... That’s nothing for Yohane. It’s just a little stimulation......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>......I got it. Ruby will order the creamy salmon and spinach pasta.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That was quick.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>The cream pasta will balance out the spiciness of the diablo pasta. And if you can’t handle the spice, then you can have some of Ruby’s, Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ruby...... It’s Yohane, not Yoshiko. But, thanks......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
